hibernate-mapping.query: from Article where cast(type as string) = ? Order by uptime desc
from Article as a where cast(a.pass as string) like ? and a.time like ? and a.person.account like ? and a.title like ? and cast(a.type as string) = ? Order by a.uptime desc
from Article as a where a.column_id like ? and cast(a.pass as string) like ? and a.time like ? and a.title like ? and cast(a.type as string) = ? Order by a.uptime desc
select count(*) from Article as a where column_id like ? and time like ? and cast(pass as string) like ?
from Person as p where cast(p.role.role_code as string) = ?
from Person as p where cast(p.state as string) like ? and p.account like ? and p.role.rolename like ? and cast(p.role.role_code as string) = ?
from Role as r
from Role as r where cast(r.role_code as string) like ? and r.rolename like ?
from Role as r where r.role_code = ?
from Role as r where r.rolename = ?
from Auth as a
from Auth as a where a.upnum >= ? and a.upnum <=? and a.totalnum >= ? and a.totalnum <=? and a.lasttime >= ? and a.lasttime <=?
from Key as k
from Key as k where k.times >= ? and k.times <= ?
from Product as p
from Product as p where p.productname like ? and cast(p.state as string) like ? and cast(p.pass as string) like ? and p.person.realname like ?
from ProAction as pa
from ProAction as pa where pa.product.productname like ? and pa.product.person.realname like ?
from Demand as d
from Demand as d where cast(d.state as string) like ? and cast(d.pass as string) like ? and d.person.realname like ?
from Order as o where cast(o.type as string) like ? Order by buytime desc
from Order as o where cast(o.state as string) like ? and o.person.account like ? and o.product.productname like ? and cast(o.type as string) = ? Order by buytime desc
from Order as o where cast(o.state as string) like ? and o.person.realname like ? and o.demand.introduce like ? and cast(o.type as string) = ? Order by buytime desc
from Prorecord where action_id = ? order by recordtime desc
